title: Pokemon Movie 3 - Lord of the Unknown Crystal Tower [Eng SUB]
description:
This is the third PokÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â©mon movie, Lord of the "Unknown" Crystal Tower or Kesshou tou no Teiou ENTEI. I got an old subbed VHS off of Ebay many years ago, and since I could not find a subtitled version of the third movie anywhere online, I decided to rip my DVD copy and then transcribe the subtitles from my VHS to the DVD rip. In the process of encoding and re-encoding etc etc the quality suffered just a little, and I'm not very familiar with subtitling, so some of the timing might be slightly off here or there, and I definitely don't have any fancy neat karaoke effects or anything for the songs since I have no idea how to do that.

BUT I did my best and it should all be readable and timed mostly correctly. As for translation questions, I can't really field those questions since I just copied what my VHS said, and I have no idea who translated it in the first place.



TO REVIEW

Pocket Monsters the Movie 3 - Lord of the "Unknown" Crystal Tower: Entei. Japanese audio, English subtitles. DVD rip with some light artifacting.
